data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Bhola to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bhola, Barisal, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Bhola, Barisal, Bangladesh a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,226 believers in Bhola to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,774,574 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, let those from the 2,226 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kaghazi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Pour your Spirit out on the 1,776,800 citizens of Bhola, Barisal, Bangladesh, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Bhola, Barisal, Bangladesh to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Bhola, Barisal, Bangladesh to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
